mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point(pno, mno, gnp, pcode, sumpoint, bno) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(pno) + 1, 1000000001) FROM point), ( SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id} ), -#{gnp}, 201, (SELECT sumpoint FROM point WHERE ( SELECT MAX(pno) FROM point WHERE mno = ( SELECT mno FROM member WHERE id = #{id} ) ) = pno) - #{gnp}, #{bno} )
